Data Scientist: Proficient in Python, Pandas, Machine Learning, SQL, and Statistics. Should be able to build models, analyze datasets, and communicate results.
AI Engineer: Designs and builds AI models using machine learning, deep learning, and data processing techniques. Should know Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLP, and MLOps.
Software Developer: Skilled in Java, Git, object-oriented programming (OOP), RESTful APIs, and working with databases. Should build scalable backend systems.
